title: API Regression Suite for Payment / Trading Platform
oneLiner: Data-driven API regression suite aligned with CI/CD quality gates.
context: QA support for a transaction-heavy platform where reliability and release confidence are critical.
work: Designed coverage strategy, built repeatable regression flows, and added CI checks to reduce release risk.

title: UI Automation for Cloud Application
oneLiner: Stable UI automation focused on critical user journeys and risk-based coverage.
context: Continuous delivery environment requiring fast feedback and reliable automation.
work: Created maintainable test structure and reporting to speed up regression cycles and support releases.
